title: Opening Celebration Painting the Floating World: Ukiyo-e Masterpieces from the Weston Collection
title_display: Opening Celebration: Painting the Floating World—Ukiyo-e Masterpieces from the Weston Collection
description:
Sustaining Fellows are invited to discover nearly 150 works from the magnificent Weston Collection—ukiyo-e paintings from the 17th to 19th century by the most prominent artists of the time, including Utamaro and Hokusai—at this festive event featuring a lecture, exhibition viewing, and reception.

This program is open to Sustaining Fellows only. To join or make reservations, please call (312) 443-3735 or email sustainingfellows@artic.edu.

Visit Sustaining Fellows to learn more about the museum's leadership giving society.
buy_button_caption:
$80 per person
